Class Account

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.Account
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Account>
public class Account extends Object implements Comparable<Account>, Serializable
Represents a player account for the 2048 game. Stores the player's username, score, and manages saving/loading account data for leaderboard tracking.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Account o)
      Compares this account to another based on score, for leaderboard sorting. Accounts with higher scores are ordered first.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Account>
      Parameters:
      o - the account to compare against
      Returns:
      a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this account's score is greater than, equal to, or less than the specified account's score

    • addToScore

      public void addToScore(long score)
      Adds the given amount to the account's score.
      Parameters:
      score - the number of points to add
